items.title: All of the Switch 2 games releasing in September 2025

items.title: Space DOTS raises $1.5M seed round to provide insights on orbital threats

She and her team have created a software platform for space tech manufacturers and operators to help them capture various data points, like radiation interference, as well as track any in-orbit anomalies, to help make space travel safer.
